data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: One probable cause of the recent recession was the housing market crash. Many ____ were ____ homes ____ in ____ they ____ not ____, ____ at ____ point ____ were ____ longer ____ to ____ payments. Many banks that loaned money for the purchasing of homes lost money at this point, likely leading to economic difficulties.

Many peo___ were buy___ homes th__ in rea____ they co___ not aff___, a__ at so__ point th__ were n_ longer ab__ to ma__ payments. Many banks that loaned money for the purchasing of homes lost money at this point, likely leading to economic difficulties.
data.answer: 最近经济衰退的一个可能原因是房地产市场的崩溃。很多人买的房子实际上是他们负担不起的，在某种程度上他们无法再支付。很多贷款买房的银行在这个时候损失了钱，可能导致经济困难。
